title: Yummy pineapple fruit cake
ingredients: ['1 (454g) tin crushed pineapple, strained', '300g mixed dried friut (including cherries and raisins)', '225g caster sugar', '100g soft margarine', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon mixed spice', '2 eggs, beaten', '100g plain flour', '100g self-raising flour']
